reports
Class SaleReporter

java.lang.Object
  reports.SaleReporter

public class SaleReporter
extends java.lang.Object

This SaleReporter is a control object that provide service to the UI. Its generateReport method will create a text file that contains a sale report with the path name specified. If the end date of the report provided from the UI is later than the date of generating the report, an exception will be thrown. IMPORTANT: Albert: since constructing the SaleReport is very time consuming, please make a process bar for this service.

Method Detail

generateReoprt

public void generateReoprt(java.util.Date startDate,
                           java.util.Date endDate,
                           java.lang.String pathName)
                    throws java.sql.SQLException,
                           java.io.IOException
This method generate a sale report to a text file. The report period is specified by the parameters. Also its destination file path name is passed to the parameter.

Parameters:
startDate - The start date of the report.
endDate - The end date of the report.
patbooleanhName - The destination path name.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - from the database error while construcing the SaleReport object.
java.io.IOException - If the endDate of the report is later than the date of reporting, this exception will be thrown.
